element.name: Arrest Witnessed By
element.definition: Indication of who the cardiac arrest was witnessed by.
element.v3Comment: This element is a component of the Utstein Cardiac Arrest Criteria as identified in the American Heart Association journal "Resuscitation" from 2004 entitled "Cardiac Arrest and Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Outcome Reports". http://circ.ahajournals.org/cgi/content/full/110/21/3385

asserts.assert: Arrest Witnessed By should be recorded when Cardiac Arrest is "Yes...".
Arrest Witnessed By should only be recorded when Cardiac Arrest is "Yes...".
When Arrest Witnessed By is "Not Witnessed", no other value should be recorded.
When Arrest Witnessed By has a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting), it should be empty.

When Arrest Witnessed By is empty, it should have a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting, if allowed for the element) or a Pertinent Negative (if allowed for the element), or it should be omitted (if the element is optional).
When Arrest Witnessed By has a Not Value, no other value should be recorded.
